page.title: 07WILDLIFE AROUND ULLAPOOL.
page.content: By a 12 year old girl. ______________________ Around Ullapool we have a variety of wildlife.There are seagulls,ospreys, hooded crows,ptarmigan,grouse,eagles, kestrels and buzzards,to name but a few. Some boat trips from Ullapool take you to see the seals. Red deer,roe deer,fallow deer and Sika deer are other beauties of the Ullapool area.Many people like to see deer,but if they do not see them and would like a photogragh of them they can buy postcards. There are also lots of Highland cows, bulls and their calves.Horses,sheep, wildcats,otters and foxes are other attractions. Many people come to Ullapool to admire the animals and the birds.
